org.activebpel.rt.xml
Class AeXMLParserBase

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.xml.AeXMLParserBase
public class AeXMLParserBase
extends java.lang.Object

This class is a base for all those implementing a parse routine. This class explicitly forces the use of the Xerces parser.

Method Detail

loadDocumentFromString

public org.w3c.dom.Document loadDocumentFromString(java.lang.String aXmlString,
                                                   java.util.Iterator aSchemas)
                                            throws AeException
This method will load the Document for the given xml string with settings defined by the concrete class. An iterator of Schema objects can optionally be passed if schema validation is to be performed.

Parameters:
aXmlString - the xml string.
aSchemas - an Iterator of Schema objects or null if not performing schema validation.
Returns:
the document loaded or null if an error has occurred during parse
Throws:
AeException

                                         java.util.Iterator aSchemas)
                                  throws AeException

Parameters:
aFilename - the file to be loaded
aSchemas - an Iterator of Schema objects or null if not performing schema validation.
Returns:
the document loaded or null if an error has occurred during parse

AeException

loadDocument

public org.w3c.dom.Document loadDocument(java.io.InputStream aInput,
                                         java.util.Iterator aSchemas)
                                  throws AeException
This method will load the Document for the given input stream with settings defined by the concrete class. An iterator of Schema objects can optionally be passed if schema validation is to be performed.

Parameters:
aInput - the input stream to load the document from. This stream gets closed as part of this call.
aSchemas - an Iterator of Schema objects or null if not performing schema validation.
Returns:
the document loaded or null if an error has occurred during parse
Throws:
AeException

validateDocument

public void validateDocument(org.w3c.dom.Document aDocument,
                             java.util.Iterator aSchemas)
                      throws AeException
This method will validate the Document looking for parse errors. An iterator of Schema objects can optionally be passed if schema validation is to be performed.

Parameters:
aDocument - the document to be validated
aSchemas - an Iterator of Schema objects or null if not performing schema validation.
Throws:
AeException - if an error occurs parsing the document

createDocument

public org.w3c.dom.Document createDocument()
This method is used to create an empty document as a starting node. If an error occurs null will be returned.

getErrorHandler

public AeXMLParserErrorHandler getErrorHandler()
Method which provides and instance of the error handler used during parse. If one does not exist when it is called for, a default one will be created.

getTransformerFactory

public static javax.xml.transform.TransformerFactory getTransformerFactory()
Returns:
The cached transformer factory

loadTransformerFactory

protected static javax.xml.transform.TransformerFactory loadTransformerFactory()
Loads the transformer factory. Uses the AE system property if it is set, otherwise it defaults to the typical TransformerFactory.newInstance() call.

serializeSchemas

protected java.util.List serializeSchemas(java.util.List aSchemas)
                                   throws AeException
Converts list of Castor Schema objects to InputStreams so they can be set on the factory/parser and used by the jaxp provider to validate the document. Also supports already-serialized schemas (Strings or InputStreams).

Parameters:
aSchemas - - list of Castor schema objects
Throws:
AeException

getWSDLLocator

public javax.wsdl.xml.WSDLLocator getWSDLLocator()
